Title: Little Forest: Winter/Spring
Actors: Ai Hashimoto, Mayu Matsuoka, YÃ´ichi Nukumizu, Karen Kirishima
Plot: Ichiko lived in a big city, but goes back to her small hometown Komori, located on a mountain in the Tohoku region. She is self-sufficient. Ichiko gains energy living among nature and eating foods she makes from seasonal ingredients.
